mapper.select: SELECT id_cpu, name_cpu, release_cpu, core_cpu, thread_cpu, maxghz_cpu, minghz_cpu, type_code_cpu, manf_code_cpu FROM cpu
SELECT id_cpu, name_cpu, release_cpu, core_cpu, thread_cpu, maxghz_cpu, minghz_cpu, type_code_cpu, manf_code_cpu FROM cpu WHERE id_cpu = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cpu (name_cpu, release_cpu, core_cpu, thread_cpu, maxghz_cpu, minghz_cpu, type_code_cpu, manf_code_cpu) VALUES (#{nameCpu}, #{releaseCpu}, #{coreCpu}, #{threadCpu}, #{maxGhzCpu}, #{minGhzCpu}, #{typeCodeCpu}, #{manfCodeCpu})
